results.definition: the amount by which the cost of a business exceeds its revenue
examples: the company operated at a loss last year

results.definition: military personnel lost by death or capture
the disadvantage that results from losing something
examples: his loss of credibility led to his resignation

results.definition: gradual decline in amount or activity

examples: the car was a total loss
loss of livestock left the rancher bankrupt

results.definition: the act of losing someone or something
examples: everyone expected him to win so his loss was a shock

results.definition: the experience of losing a loved one
examples: he sympathized on the loss of their grandfather
